Placing a `<WebView>` in a parent element that uses a `wrap_content layout_height` can lead to subtle bugs; use `match_parent` instead

location.message: `wrap_content` here may not work well with WebView below

This call references a method added in API level 29; however, the containing class com.example.androidx.app.AppCompatDefaultNightModeBootAwareActivity is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
